title: Floral Symphony: Delicate Diamond and Gemstone Necklace
materials: Peridot (20.84 NV Fancy weight). Expertly crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: A beautifully handcrafted floral design featuring intricate diamond-studded petals and vibrant gemstone accents. This necklace showcases a modern take on the traditional haaram, blending delicate flower motifs with a contemporary silhouette. The design includes alternating floral patterns, each meticulously set to maximize brilliance and create a captivating visual texture. The use of varied stone shapes (round, pear, marquise) adds depth and dimension.
colors: Rose gold provides a warm backdrop for the sparkling white diamonds
pale yellow-green peridot and lustrous white pearls. This harmonious blend of colors is both elegant and eye-catching.
occasions: Perfect for both modern and traditional celebrations. Wear it to weddings
or even a special 'half-saree' function. It also makes a sophisticated statement piece for upscale events and evening galas.
description: This floral haaram is a unique fusion of classic and contemporary design. The high-quality gemstones and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The rose gold adds a touch of modern elegance, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
